descriptor.name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY) Advisor
descriptor.short_desc: Train to guide parents in opening and managing an SSY account for a girl child's future.
descriptor.long_desc:
Course Overview:
This module focuses on the Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana, a small savings scheme for the girl child. Agents will learn about account opening rules, deposit limits, maturity and withdrawal conditions, and the tax benefits associated with the scheme.

list.value: Parents or legal guardians of a girl child below 10 years
